attributes.action: meet the Dalai Lama as a small gesture to show the regard in which his Holiness is held in the UK as he is a great spiritual leader. And to express our sadness at the intention of the Chinese to take the olympic flag up Mount Everest whilst Tibet is so oppressed. Hardly an Olympic ideal.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
